Literature.Title: A Novel Antimicrobial Peptide Spampcin56-86 from Scylla paramamosain Exerting Rapid Bactericidal and Anti-Biofilm Activity In Vitro and Anti-Infection In Vivo.
Literature.Author: Jiang M, Chen R, Zhang J, Chen F, Wang KJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus CGMCC 1.2465(MIC=3µM),Listeria monocytogenes CGMCC 1.10753(MIC=3µM),Enterococcus faecalis CGMCC 1.2135(MIC=3µM),Enterococcus faecium CGMCC 1.131(MIC=1.5µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis CGMCC 1.4260(MIC=6µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CGMCC 1.2421(MIC=3µM),Escherichia coli CGMCC 1.2389(MIC=6µM),Acinetobacter baumannii CGMCC 1.6769(MIC=6µM),Cryptococcus neoformans CGMCC 2.1563(MIC=12µM),Fusarium graminearum CGMCC 3.4521(MIC=3µM),Fusarium solani CGMCC 3.5840(MIC=3µM),Aspergillus niger CGMCC 3.316(MIC=24µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(no activity data),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(no activity data)
